io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.theme

Class DefaultTheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.theme.DefaultTheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Theme

    public class DefaultTheme
extends java.lang.Object
implements Theme
    The default theme used for the GUI system.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468
